Members.name: IsRunning
Members.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the device loop is running.

Members.name: ConfigureFrontend
Members.summary: Configure the frontend socket using a fluent interface.
Members.returns: A object used to define socket configuration options.

Members.name: ConfigureBackend
Members.summary: Configure the backend socket using a fluent interface.
Members.returns: A object used to define socket configuration options.

Members.name: Join1
Members.summary: Blocks the calling thread until the device terminates.

Members.name: Join2
Members.summary: Blocks the calling thread until the device terminates or the specified time elapses.
Members.param: A set to the amount of time to wait for the device to terminate.
Members.returns: true if the device terminated; false if the device has not terminated after the amount of time specified by has elapsed.
